snippet: After a $1.2 billion financing round just last week, the start-up is close to securing an investment worth hundreds of millions of dollars from China’s top search engine.
abstract: After a $1.2 billion financing round just last week, the start-up is close to securing an investment worth hundreds of millions of dollars from China’s top search engine.

byline.original: By PAUL MOZUR and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

lead_paragraph: Uber has already raised billions of dollars from investors in the Western world. Now, it is close to receiving even more from one of the most powerful Internet companies in China.

headline.main: Uber Said to Be Near Investment Deal With Baidu
